values:
So I'm here at work just thinking about things. I think its messed up that i can't just post on myspace, or look at my facebook account without having to go through lots of proxies. Personally its bullshit.
I'm in a generally good mood today, which is odd considering I'm at work. 
I had a pretty good morning with the kids today. I didn't feed the baby before I took him to the sitter's  this morning-does that make me a bad parent? I knew if I had moved him around a whole bunch he would just wake up and be even more pissed off. He didn't have a very good night.
He woke up around 230am, looking for some food of course. I nursed him, and he just wasn't in the mood. So I gave in and got up and made a bottle for him-he drank 1 oz. and then just cried and cried. I changed his pamper and double checked that he wasn't to hot or injured. But he just cried and cried. Finally at 4am, he fell asleep. It was a magical silence! So I didn't want to disturb him at 545am. I wish I could have gotten more sleep myself, but you know the saying "the needs of the many out weigh the needs of the few"
Man I'm tired of being the few. *pouts*
More later
http://sinfulldd.livejournal.com/5140.html

Current mood: curious 
Category: Food and Restaurants 


So as I sat there at my booth looking off into space, and by space I mean the bar...I wondered, Does anyone I know come to this place? Does anyone know about Laterna?  


The is the bar at Laterna. Its rather well stocked. Carol was our waitress and bartender, she's niffty!


There are numerous bottles of spirits....just dying to be drank by all of you over 21! 

Do people truly know the caliber of food that they are missing out on? Greek food is wonderful. There are also TONS of Americanesque alternative. Unfortunately there are NO chicken tenders on the adult menu...sorry 'Hanna. I have never looked at the kids menu, but I saw some kid eating a bowl of spagehtti...so its possible.

They have a 40.00 bottle of Merlot that I am going to drink next time I go. I'll be wearing better shoes in case I get sauced.


For all of you anit-big corporation people, you'll be glad to know that Laterna is a locally owned restaurant. The man has lived in Wilmington NC for quite some time, he's actually got another restaurant in town. There's a brief history on the owner and his family on the back of the menu. Check it out, its actually interesting. 

So until then, enjoy this great place. Laterna. Its where Perkins used to be, so you already know where its at! They're open from 11am-12am every weekday, and from 11a-2am on the weekends. 

They serve breakfast, lunch, and dinner. They've got a huge selection of food that I can't pronounce, but tastes really great. I am currently using the caveman style of ordering from the menu...pointing and staring at her, hoping she can get the hint. I can however tell her that I want Hummus, Spanikopita, Tzazti, and Greek Salad. How American of me. Why is it that I keep trying to pronounce Greek words with an Italian accent? They're not the same! Damn my ignorance! 

Come, eat, be merry!
http://sinfulldd.livejournal.com/4996.html

Self absorbtion...dissolve 
Current mood:  depressed 
Category: Life 


I feel like screaming. I feel overwhelmed. I feel that I have nobody to talk with. I feel alone. I feel trivial. I feel sad. I feel like I'm not important. What happened to my anniversary? Perhaps I shouldn't ask, because that just makes you want to do it less right?

Am I really overly dramatic? Is it bad to cry because you're going to miss someone? Is it my fault that I have feelings and emotions, and some people don't? Should I not feel in front of them? What do I do?

I feel like cutting again, but I can't because she's here. I just wish I could blink out of existance, but then who would take care of her? 

Have I really put that much more on my plate? I have more responsibilty than I should. I can't do this all by myself. I need help. I want help. But there's no help for me, is there. 

I need touch. Its always about that, yeah think that to yourself. Its all I ever want, yeah. Just a simple hug, its not much to ask for. Hug me without sighing deeply, am I that disgusting? 

Maybe its not me that has a problem. Maybe its you. Wouldn't it be awesome to know that all along, I wasn't crazy? And I only ever thought I was because you made me feel that way?
http://sinfulldd.livejournal.com/4769.html

Well today was disappointing. Here's a hint for couples. If you don't see each other often, don't get anyone's hopes up. Don't wake a person up after you get off work, for nothing. If you tell them earlier that day that you've got to get some rest before work (fine), and that "we always have tonight"...man just don't fucking lie. Don't pretend that all of a sudden its weird that your partner's pissed. First off, don't wake them up, because most likely they're expecting it, because you told them. Don't act like a fucking slow kid when they get disappointed. I know its not nice to ask for sex, but when it seems that is the only way a person gets it...well, you could probably see why they do. 
I feel ridiculous. I feel like the ugliest person alive. Am I so horrible that even the man who "says he loves me" doesn't want to touch me. The only time he seems to want to do anything is when he knows that I can't. Like in the middle of the day when my daughter's awake. Yeah, great fucking timing. But then I'm the asshole who doesn't put out right? Fuck you. Don't tell me that we'll have tonight...if all you do is come home eat a bowl of cereal, pee, and go to bed. Don't ask me if I'm pissed. You HAVE to know that I am. You have to at least understand why. But you don't. You have no idea why I'm acting all cold, do you. God! It must be great to be such an idiot. I can't tell you why I'm angry, because it gets me nowhere. The only thing it does is piss you off. I don't expect you to hang out with me all the time. But when I see you for only 30 mins the whole day, and 25 of those minutes you're preoccupied...how am I supposed to feel. No wonder I feel so unimportant. No wonder I feel like I'm just around for sex. Because when it comes time for you to want or have sex, you make sure that you get it don't you. Because if I don't put out, I feel like you'll just find some other girl to fuck. Then you wonder why I feel like I'm just around for sex. That's why. You say we talk, but we don't. Its mostly me babbling about something you don't give a shit about. Maybe your father's right...maybe I'm just not good enough for you? Maybe if I was you'd act like you gave a fuck about me. Don't just tell me you love me...show me. Make me feel like I matter to you more than just when we're having sex. You don't have to tell me that "sex last night was awesome" especially if I'm already feeling like that's all I am to you. You go on and on about how great the sex was...great. Now if only you could be that excited about everything else in our "relationship". I don't think you'd ever stand up for me. If you dad was talking shit about me in front of you, you'd let him wouldn't you? Yeah, show's how much you really care. Does it not bother you that I seem to think the world of you and love you and do EVERYTHING for you, and you...all you do is fuck me once in awhile and pay 1/2 the bills, and not even 1/2. I'm never going to be good enough for you. Today you'll go to class, come home and "be tired" and sleep before  you have to get up and go to work. You won't get off work until 9am. Then you'll need a nap before a meeting at 12...and I'll have to leave around then. I won't get back in town till at least 6pm, no matter how fast I'm driving. It may even be 7pm. Great...then you'll be asleep. You'll wake up at 8 to be at work at 9...I won't see you again until 9am. Right, why do we even live together? I may as well move out. I never see you. When I do you're always fucking tired or in a bad mood. You never act like my presence is the one you want. I"m sorry I'm not as good as Elizabeth. Obviously she was soo fucking great. I feel that you're not over her. Its not fair to me. Its not fair to our relationship. Perhaps I am the crazy one, and I'm imagining this. But then why do you still talk to her? Why do you go to her myspace page daily? Why does she still call you? Why do you bother keeping in contact with someone who treated you like such shit, and me...I get treated like shit. I'm the one who's been here for you. I'm the one who treats you better than you've ever been treated. But that's not good enough for you is it? You want to be left alone. You want to be sad. You want to be degraded. Well, I'm not doing that. If that's what you want-then go back to that ugly redheaded bitch. Don't waste my fucking time. Its always about this isn't it. I feel inadequate. You never do do you? You just walk around with this stupid inflated sense of self. You make me sick. Everything's not okay. Why do you act like it is? You'll wake up in the morning, I'll still be pissed. You'll act like nothing ever happened. I won't forget. I bet after class, you won't spend any time with us. You'll be "too tired". Fine. I don't care. Perhaps I should find someone else to spend my time with, someone who's willing to make the sacrafice to make me happy. Because obviously you're not. You're too worried about Elizabeth and how her life is going. Your life is right here. You should pay more attention to it, before its gone. A person will only stick around for so long. Remember that.
http://sinfulldd.livejournal.com/4494.html

SO my last blog was to someone really great. Let me tell you about how my V-day went:

I got up later than I wanted to, he calls: Just wanted to make sure you're up

Got to work, work sucked, ran errands, accidentally rented the same movie he did-trying to surprise him

Went to Honda to make an appt, went to the bank to take out more than I wanted to (pouts)

I get home, he starts rattling things off that he wants me to do, he's getting settled in as well.

I do these things, because they're no problem at all. Fill the cat dish, and something else-oh get him a drink....

I open the fridge door...HOLY SHIT!!!!



To my surprise there sits: 1 baker's dozen of red roses, 1 video I was dying to see, and 1 big bottle of Crown Royal Reserve (I love Crown-I'm gangsta I know)

I just look at these items for a second...do I really see them? I had all but abandoned the idea that I would receive anything for this "holiday", because frankly I didn't think I deserved it. I haven't been myself for awhile, and I'm finally getting my brains back in my head-slowly but surely.

So, as I stand here looking at these things (keep in mind he's pretended that nothings up the whole time) my heart just about explodes, my eyes get all watery, my lip quivers...I think I'm going to pass out. I guess people do listen to me when I talk-sometimes. 

I am enraptured with this man, he never ceases to amaze me with the things he does. I remember telling him a long time ago: I wish I could just cut you open and wear you and be inside of you...*sigh* I feel great for the first time in a good long while. I just want to say "Thanks a bunches honey sugar pie-ooh, I know you hate it when I call you that" 

My roses hang in front of the door, I'm drying the bouquet, soon I will buy a vase just for them. I love him, not because of these items, but because he took the time to even consider my feelings for a split second. Thanks darling...I love you!
http://sinfulldd.livejournal.com/4158.html

What do you do when all you feel is saddness? When all you're trying to do in your life is make things right? When you're told that you should just go with the flow of things, and not control life. Life, pffft! I'm in a place where all I want to do is cry. There is anger, there is anxiety, there is saddness, there is uncertainty, there are other people involved. God, I just wish that maybe I could go with the flow of things...and just be. I change things thinking that they'll get better. I don't talk about "feelings" so much because maybe I don't want to have them. No, I don't want you to know that I'm crazy in love with you. No, I don't want you to know that I don't think I'm right for you. No, I don't want you to find anyone else. No, I don't want you to BE with anyone else. And NO, I don't want to have to just be. I don't know what the fuck I want anymore. I thought I'd be happier this way. I thought that things would still honestly just stay the same "without the title". But God knows, I knew they wouldn't. I knew that as soon as I gave a little that it would happen. I think that's why I gave a little. Its like trying to just give the inevitable a little help. You're not happy one way or the other. I'm confused. We were dandy as candy before you made me talk. I'm sorry that the old me came out a little. WTF did you expect. You didn't expect me to make the choice I made, but I did because I thought you'd be happier. I am scared that I'm gonna lose you to someone else...someone a lot like her. I don't know what to do. The thought of you even touching her sends shivers down my spine, and not the good kind...the kind that send your hairs raising. I just want to ball up and cry. I'm sooooo goddamned confused about everything. I want to be with you. I do, really. I just don't know if I can "handle" the way you like to live your life. I'm scared shitless...that you'll "befriend" someone and then the end. You say it won't happen that way...but I bet it would if your someone wanted it to be. I don't want to end the way the last one did. I am better, I am stronger...and I am a good person. But for me, I can't ever just get what I deserve. I must've screwed up along time ago...to get what I'm getting now. I don't know. I just want things to be the way they were before I opened up my mouth and decided to be an idiot. But you are happier this way. I guess I just have to accept it, if I want to be with you.
http://sinfulldd.livejournal.com/3989.html

So this week my boyfriend of a year and I have decided that we are no longer "boyfriend/girlfriend". He has decided that when you put that "title" on a relationship it ruins things. It ruins things in his opinion because then its like property. He says he feels like I own him, and that he's just a piece of furniture or something. Not fair for him to say. SO in turn I decided not to fight the obvious any longer. Its painfully clear that our relationship is not ever going to be the way I would like it, even after the compromises we've made. So I gave him what he wanted, friendship. I admit it was painful, because although this is a pointless relationship...its all I've known for the last year. And sadly enough, I do love him. Why? I couldn't tell you though. So for now on I have to get used to saying my "friend" instead of boyfriend. But its hard for him to understand that "friend" is a completely different thing for me. I don't just have sex with my friends...they're JUST FRIENDS! Now I've become "distant and hesitant to show affection", well I don't usually do that with my friends. I think I'm just scared to have 100% feelings in this because I don't think that we'll make it throughout the year. Its just hard.  
MOVING ON
Sunday night I threw him a party. It was a mildly wild keg, very small group...like less than 15 people. So small for the size I'm used to throwing. So everything's going great at the party: people are drinking and having fun, beer supply is apt, music is good, weather is perfect...but then I notice something, Kendrick's (that's his name) Josh wasn't there. Well for everyone who doesn't know Josh, I'll enlighten you as to why I thought this was important. Josh used to work with Kendrick at Harris Teeter. When I first moved in with Kendrick-strictly as a roommate-Josh was the guy I was head over-heels for! Josh is a great guy. Kinda looks like Keanu Reeves-who if you didn't know I have a total hard on for!!!! I thought the world of Josh. So I asked Kendrick to you know "hook me up". Well, later I found out that Josh thought I was creepy and stalking him. Didn't like me like that, and didn't even want to talk to me as a friend or anything to do with me. So of course me being who I am took it with a grain of salt and decided "well, fuck Josh!" But I've still always crushed on Josh, when I see him I get butterflies, my palms get sweaty, my pupils dialate...I'm like totally electric. (boogie woogie!) SO I call Josh and invite him to this party, because Kendrick "forgot" to do so. Josh gets there, and yay me!, he's having a great time. The whole night Kendrick's not really been talking to me or hanging out with me like all the other couples are, so I decide that damnit I want a man to cuddle up with. SO while Josh is talking to Kendrick, I put my arm around his waist and hug him. Josh is like 6'1 maybe 6'3, dunno tall as hell its great because my head is right by his heart...I love that. Josh hugs me back, and since I didn't move immediately away after the hug (like I usually would) he kept his arm around me. WOW! Not only was this the first time I ever touched Josh, but the first time he's ever touched me. Man alive! He kept his arm around me for like 4 hours really. With the hand that was over my shoulders/behind my back, we held hands. He rubbed my hand, I grazed his back with my nails under his jacket. For like 4 hours I got to laugh in his armpit, be held when I was cold...it was like he was meant for ME! Of course we talked, and I asked him about how he felt about me...that whole creepy/stalker issue. Come to find out-HE NEVER SAID ANYTHING LIKE THAT! So this leads me to instantly like him so much more, because no I know that he doesn't think I'm a total fruit. For the first time in like 6 months I was happy. All my saddness and depression melted away. I felt like I used to in high school...GRRRREAT! When I got home I called Josh to make sure he got home okay, and vice versa. We talked a bit, it was nice. Then I decided to ask him to a movie. And his response- *bad brakes sound effect* "Yeah it'd be cool to catch a movie with you and I guess Kendrick" *glass shattering sound effect* With Kendrick?! Damnit...am I really that off as to how feelings are here? You flirt with me, very much so ALL night and then that? What the hell am I supposed to do? Ugh...I'm confused. So I told him I'd give a call someday this week, I thought Weds...but I was tipsy and a lot was going on in the background at my apt (drunk people) and I didn't catch what time he said he wanted me to call. Damn! So I don't realize this until Monday night around 11pm. So, in great creepy/stalker fashion, I call. He's not there so I left a message that I called. Bet he's gonna be like damn I told that girl to call WEDS not now. Ugh, hopefully things go swell. 
Gotta go shop...more next time...stay tuned.
http://sinfulldd.livejournal.com/3631.html

So I've had crazy dreams lately and well things aren't going as well as they could go in the fantasy land. Most recent dream:
Walking with a tribe from I don't know where, I am going to assume that they were Gallic, only by the way we were talking. Well were walking along this dense wood, trying to find the cure for Angelina Jolie, who just happens to be the princess Gladriel-from LOTR-, who has been poisoned by extreme exposure to methane gas. So we have this makeshift cart, made of young trees and rope, been drug behind the Budweiser horses-Klaisdales?-, and she's on it, surrounded by a mosquito net of red. Her robes were all in red, her shoes were black. Her hair was long, and the ends were starting to turn white, with her sickness. Her eyes were not they're usual color, instead they were turning red. But nonetheless, there's hardly a picture I could paint with words that would describe her majestic nature even in a dream, where she's in critical condition. So to steal another seen from LOTR-the one where the elves are migrating to the ship-we are in the same kind of procession. Only the aura that surrounds us is not of white and fairey majick...its of war and passion. Apparently we're a warring tribe, and we kill savagely...most of the time for the sheer entertainment value. So to look at our tribe, clad in red robes, our lanterns shine with a crimson light...and then to see this glorious tent-if you will-we are art in action. We walk through the woods for what seems like forever, and then we come across a section of the forrest that is made of bamboo and parsnips. I know, they don't even grow in the same climate, and there's no way to explain why parsnips were about 4-6 feet tall, but they were. As we walk through this forrest, we have to pick parsnip to save the Princess, but it can only be the purest white variety. As we pick our parsnips, we come across the mage that is to help us. His tower is magnificent! His tower towers the tower of Saurmun! Its a huge marble tower, but the marble is red. Imagine if you will a topographic map of a dense forest, and smack in the middle is this huge tower of red marble. Above it swirls purple and black clouds. No matter how menacing it looks, your eyes can't help but look at it. You're drawn to it, entranced by it, called. 
When you enter the tower, there's a serious of rooms, its like a labyrinth. This maze has consequences though, every wrong step is a minute of life drained from the princess.
 -Random jump in memory-
The Princess is in a beaker, full of what can only be described as Tang. She stands there while the mage carefully slices pieces of parsnip. She seems to float in some kind of animated suspension. Its terrifying and we, the red robed ones, are all around in a circle, chanting. Chanting, chanting in a Gregorian type song...images of Dark Ages monks come to mind-mind you apparently this happens prior to that.
And suddenly I awake!
Grumpy and groggy...but also saddened. I feel as though I could cry any minutes. But I do not, because there is no need to do so.
But I thought I'd share that with you.
http://sinfulldd.livejournal.com/3519.html

Its that time of the year again...that time where everyone is supposed to be all happy and cheery....well, I'm boycotting it this year. So there, I said it! I don't want to get anything for anyone because it will never be good enough, so what's the point of trying...it for the reaction that I give gifts...not for the receiving of gifts. I could care less what anyone gets me. But GODDAMNIT!!!! When I get you a gift you better act like its the best GODDAMNED gift you've ever received, if not, rest assured that I will remember it...and next year you will get a something far less meaningfull if at all. So do me a favor and humor me this year...and if you don't get a gift for Christmas, know that you will, it will just be late.
http://sinfulldd.livejournal.com/3199.html

sometimes you ever just feel that you want to die? I do, often. ever find something you're not supposed to find? like naked pics of the ex? Your boyfriend's ex. Nice little naked pics of her. Nice videos of her giving the shittiest blow job...to him. Then you feel sooo angry you don't know what to do with yourself. You can't break things, you can't kill things, the only thing you can do is hurt yourself. Hurting yourself. Its the easiest thing to do. Just take a razor blade and make the cuts. I like to make medium size cuts myself, no sense in having little tiny cuts right? Have to make them bleed in order to get all the hatred and pain and insecurity out right? Can't have that in there making you "suck the fun out of life" now can we. It would seem that I do that enough on my own, don't need any "extra" help. I just want to hurt him some way. The only way I can is to make him see how badly he makes me feel. But its only when he's talking to her. She treated him like shit...but he still loves her. I treat him like a fucking KING...and its almost like i'm a servant. Sometimes I wish I didn't exist.
http://sinfulldd.livejournal.com/2849.html

Whats up crazy kids...its time to see what i'll come up with next. watch out i'm totally crazy about....*drum rolls* boobs! And before you ask, yes they are really real, you can touch them for about $5.00, yes they keep getting bigger. Well what can i say, they are just a great part of a body. They don't even have to be chick boobs exclusively either. I don't discriminate against the men. Hey bitch if you have enough money to get your ta tas  done...then by all means, get the best ones money can buy.  Now i generally like little titties...they're just sooo cute, aren't they?! I don't mean so small that you lay down and look like a man, gotta have just a little tiny bump. Now my love on the other hand loves big boobs. Which i suppose is a good thing...seeing as how i'm pushing outta a F cup already. God the things just keep getting bigger and bigger. Used to date a guy who wasn't fond of boobs...god that sucked. Talk about feeling neglected! The girls and i were just never satisfied. Alas, we find a lover who can truly appreciate the ta-tas...and its good. Nothing like a face slapping, suffocatin, nipple torturing time...huh ladies?? Well admit that i haven't found many women who will agree with me about that....but they're mine and that's our story and we're sticking to it damnit!!! Ah, there's nothing better than getting sweaty with your lover and then just turning a fan on those bad boys...mmm, makes me feel better just thinking about it! Well darlings just a thought for today. Shnoogens

***Hyper Ballad (Bjork)-
we live on a mountain
right at the top
there's a beautiful view
from the top of the mountain
every morning i walk towards the edge
and throw little things off
like:
car-parts, bottles and cutlery
or whatever i find lying around

it's become a habit 
a way
to start the day

i go through this 
before you wake up
so i can feel happier
to be safe up here with you

it's real early morning
no-one is awake
i'm back at my cliff
still throwing things off
i listen to the sounds they make
on their way down
i follow with my eyes 'til they crash
imagine what my body would sound like
slamming against those rocks

and when it lands
will my eyes
be closed or open?

i'll go through all this
before you wake up
so i can feel happier
to be safe up here with you

***I love you (Sarah MacLachlan)-
I have a smile

we meet at the lights

the world around disappears

just you and me
on this island of hope
a breath between us could be miles

let me surround you
my sea to your shore
let me be the calm you seek

oh and every time I'm close to you
there's too much I can't say

and I forgot
to tell you

and the night's
too long
and cold here
without you 
I grieve in my condition
for I cannot find the strength to say I need you so

oh and every time I'm close to you
there's too much I can't say
and you just walk away

and I forgot
to tell you
I love you
and the night's
too long

without you

***Mr. Jones (Counting Crows)-
I was down at the New Amsterdam staring
at this yellow-haired girl
Mr. Jones strikes up a conversation with this
black- haired flamenco dancer
She dances while his father plays guitar
She's suddenly beautiful
We all want something beautiful
man I wish I was beautiful
So come dance this silence down through the morning
Cut up, Maria! Show me some of them Spanish dances
Pass me a bottle, Mr. Jones
Believe in me
Help me believe in anything
cause I want to be someone who believes
Mr. Jones and me tell each other fairy tales
and we st are at the beautiful women
"She's looking at you. Ah, no, no, she's looking at me."
Smiling in the bright lights
Coming through in stereo
When everybody loves you, you can never be lonely
I will paint my picture
Paint myself in blue and red and black and gray
All of the beautiful colors are very very meaningful
Gray is my favorite color
I felt so symbolic yesterday
If I knew Picasso
I would buy myself a gray guitar and play
Mr. Jones and me look into the future
Stare at the beautiful women

Ever just wanted to be noticed? 
Ever just wanted to be seen?
Ever done something for someone, and they don't see it?
Hoping to surprise them, and end up disappointed?

You get that sick feeling in your body.
Almost like you're gonna cry.
But there's no reason to cry.
Do they realize what you've done?

That sick feeling grows in you. 
You don't know what to do with it.
You want to scream.
But you can't.
It does nothing.

Tiny cuts in the skin.
Help to let freedom in.
Drops of blood make you laugh.
The pain is release.

Humiliation is the closest word for that feeling.
Plunging on the top of a roller coaster.
How your stomach jumps. 
That's the feeling of disappointment.

But there's guilt in this disappointment.
There's an excuse for nonchalantly brushing me aside.
Rest.  Tired.  Sleepy.
Yah, I'm selfish.
You're not a toy.

So torn between wanting to feel angry and understanding.
"You look nice"-Thanks.
The look on my face could have broken a million hearts.
But yours was tired.

If I understand, why does it hurt?
If I'm compassionate, why does it hurt?
If I'm good, why don't you care?
I want to leave and never come back, but I can't.

I can't hurt you.
You can hurt me.

Well this is the first entry on this, hope it works...if not I'll just have to try it again. I'm here listening to some music...looking up some interesting things about birth control b/c I'm a girl and I wanna know the best of the best before I settle for second best. You know, gotta be sure I'm not paying too much...then I'd really be white huh?! 
So far here's what I've come up with: 

*The boring ass pill that I choke down every day at the same time- 
95 to 99.9%effective 
The pill may add to your risk of heart disease, including high blood pressure, blood clots, and blockage of the arteries. If you are over age 35 and smoke, or have a history of blood clots or breast or endometrial cancer, your health care provider may advise you not to take the pill.(I smoke!!) 

*The "Copper T IUD"- 
99%effective 
yah...sounds like soo much effin fun...but it works for 10 years...the arms of the Copper T IUD contain some copper, which stops fertilization by preventing sperm from making their way up through the uterus into the fallopian tubes. If fertilization does occur, the IUD would prevent the fertilized egg from implanting in the lining of the uterus 

*The "Progestasert IUD"- 
98%effective 
Um, yah only it lasts one year...The progesterone causes the cervical mucus to thicken so sperm cannot reach the egg, and so that a fertilized egg cannot successfully implant into the lining of the uterus. 

*The "Intrauterine System or IUS"- 
99%effective 
Again the same, but for 5 years, and it releases a small amount of a hormone each day to keep you from getting pregnant. 

*Depo-Provera- 
99.7% effective 
A shot every 3 months...Prolonged use of the drug may result in significant loss of bone density. This bone loss is greater the longer the drug is used. (NICE) 

So you can understand the huge decisions that need to be made. IUS sounds good for right now, that or the copper IUD...has the best chance of getting done. It's just getting them in that you have to worry about. Considering they go into the uterus...yah..I hope that the numb ya up or something when the do that...doesn't sound too damn fun. Oh well, all in a days work for women though right?
